function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of conceptualization of built environmental justice and health inequalities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased sick leaves and presenteeism due to unhealthy buildings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in indoor office environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of musculoskeletal disorders on economic burden","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health-related costs due to poor indoor environments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient building design leading to airborne transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and cooling capacity during extreme events leading to body heat overload and heat-related illnesses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift from natural ventilation to active cooling strategies like evaporative cooling","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hurricanes, tornados, and floods leading to mold growth in buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic highlighting the importance of hvac design and operations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-62.1 and standard-90.1 focus on thermal comfort, ventilation, and energy efficiency without considering pandemics, potentially leading to inadequate measures for controlling contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper hvac operation during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quanta correlation for sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to increased infection risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hvac system aiding the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low humidity levels allow droplets to become droplet nuclei, remain in the air for prolonged periods of time, and travel for long distances.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viruses and bacteria thrive on dry conditions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human mucus barrier weakens with low humidity levels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased probability of virus transmission due to high occupant density","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus transmission through surfaces and human-building interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about virus transmission via surfaces and the effectiveness of prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to non-wearable sensor systems","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrusiveness and effectiveness of wearable sensor systems","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective use of wearable sensors ws leading to limited disease monitoring and control.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on large-scale datasets for ai models, which may not always be available or reliable.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of incorporation of domain knowledge in data-driven ai models leading to suboptimal performance in disease monitoring and control.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of common standards and guidelines for evaluating healthy building design, risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost barrier for real-time ieq measurements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capital cost associated with introducing iot and intelligent
